attributes.action: do more for victims of domestic violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a victim of domestic violence i think that the law is not strict enough with the people who carry out this type of crime. i had to sit back on many occasions and watch my x get away with the crimes he committed against me. if he did go to prison i spent more time healing from the injuries he inflicted on me. it is not right if they do the crime they should do the time.
